definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: The money was for a needle-exchange program, but the amount was illegal.
sentences.chinese: 這筆錢用於針頭交換計劃，但其數額卻是非法的。

sentences.english: Payne's gray in thin amounts cast a shadow onto the water.
sentences.chinese: 佩恩在薄數額的灰口鑄鐵到水的影子。

sentences.english: Ms. Li declined to divulge the value of the investment by Wal-Mart, the world's leading retailer.
sentences.chinese: 李靜拒絕透露沃爾瑪這個世界零售巨頭所投資的數額。

sentences.english: I am re-posting this project for a higher amount.
sentences.chinese: 我重新發布了該項目較高的數額。

sentences.english: There are two bases upon which the court may assess the amount of costs recoverable.
sentences.chinese: 法院可基於兩點來評估當事人應獲得的訴訟費數額。

sentences.english: The others held out for the high number.
sentences.chinese: 其他人則堅持把數額定得高一些。

sentences.english: Please be quiet while I figure out the correct amount.
sentences.chinese: 我在計算出正確數額的當兒，請安靜一點。

sentences.english: The small allowance helps cover the cost of subsistence, and a full time caretaker if needed.
sentences.chinese: 津貼數額雖小，但可支付生活費和全職護理員的工資。

sentences.english: Payments by instalments may be accepted if the amount is large.
sentences.chinese: 數額較大的，可以分期交納。

sentences.english: It was still imposed by an indiction; only an indiction was declared every year.
sentences.chinese: 數額依然由訓令規定，只是變成了一年一度的訓令。

sentences.english: This amount may be suitable rehousing to further increase the amount of the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 這數額可能被安置適合數額的抵押進一步增加。

sentences.english: This amount may be suitable rehousing to further increase the amount of the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 這數額可能被安置適合數額的抵押進一步增加。

sentences.english: In view of the large amount involve in this transaction, we hope you'll agree to our request for installment payment.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於這筆交易數額較大，希望貴方能同意分期付款。

sentences.english: People who owe comparatively large amount of debt which is overdue.
sentences.chinese: 個人所負數額較大的債務到期未清償的。

sentences.english: Article 159 The buyer shall effect the payment in accordance with the contracted price.
sentences.chinese: 第一百五十九條買受人應當按照約定的數額支付價款。

sentences.english: The register will show me the amount I must pay.
sentences.chinese: 登記冊將顯示出我的數額，我必須付出。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to hand in/to hand over/to seize
